issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
Android and iOS have an API for accessing the device's compass.
Since not all devices have a hardware compass, you must test for its existence.

Android implements this as a getter property called "hasCompass".
Android also provides a function called "getHasCompass".
iOS implements this as a method called "hasCompass".

This creates an unnecessary parity difference. We should determine if this property
should be changed on one of the platforms to be either a function or getter property.
We could also introduce a new property/function to avoid breaking changes to this API.

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress in the past few years. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
